column4: after trying to update from breezy to dapper - on startup I get a message X server is diabled Restart GDM when it is configured correctly .... HELP!!!! What id GDM and how do I configure it PLZ ...
try it without the -phigh/try with very basic driver/sudo killall gdm/ctrl + alt +F7?
if you do a sudo killall gdm, dont forget a sudo gdm afterwards
